# crossingMode

**Instance Property**

The crossing behavior of the portal component.

## Declaration

```swift
var crossingMode: PortalComponent.CrossingMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

Provide a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/CrossingMode-swift.enum] to configure the crossing behaviors.
